mapper.insert: insert into find(findId, userId, title, content, image, place, time, money, registerAt, updatedAt) values(#{findId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{place}, #{time}, #{money}, #{registerAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update:
update find set title=#{findDto.title}, content=#{findDto.content}, image=#{findDto.image}, updatedAt=#{findDto.updatedAt}, userId=#{findDto.userId}, time=#{findDto.time}, place=#{findDto.place}, money=#{findDto.money}
where findId=#{findId}
